author: cms-tau-pog
body:
This PR replaces an initial DeepTauID_v2p5 model files by new ones.

The performance of the initial DeepTau v2p5 and the new (current) v2p5 model are roughly comparable, the main improvement is data-MC agreement at high VSjet bins (e.g. [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1164900/contributions/4891675/attachments/2450061/4198838/TauML_adversarial_2405.pdf#page=4)). This type of disagreement is present also for older tauIDs, namely DeepTau v2p1 and old BDT-based MVA-iso.

Full set of results of performance study on Run-2 and Run-3 samples can be found under the following link: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1164900/contributions/4891675/attachments/2450061/4204746/FinalModel.pdf, while result of a study of base models performance (used as a starting point) here: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1164900/contributions/4891675/attachments/2450061/4205013/deeptauv2p5_run2_run3_sample_comparison.pdf.

The new files are added on top of development branch removing old tauID models as in PR https://github.com/cms-data/RecoTauTag-TrainingFiles/pull/9, so the removal is also seen here as https://github.com/cms-data/RecoTauTag-TrainingFiles/pull/9 is not merged, yet.

This PR is intended to be propagated to cms-data for both master and 12_4_X.
title: New DeepTauID v2p5 model
